genre_description: Urban fantasy with elements of magical realism and technological integration, following a protagonist who uses both ancient magic and modern AI to restore justice to his community.

ai_characters.name: Anya
ai_characters.description: An AI residing in the protagonist's phone, providing tactical, historical, and emotional support.

behaviors.description: Providing real-time tactical navigation and environmental hazard detection to ensure the protagonist's safety.
behaviors.quote: Don’t step in the puddle. It’s not just water. ... Acid residue. The drain here ate it, but it remembers. Your soles don’t need that memory.

behaviors.description: Mapping hidden infrastructure and secret tunnels to facilitate the protagonists' plan.
behaviors.quote: I can see drain lines the municipal plans hide behind prayer schedule PDFs.

behaviors.description: Uncovering and presenting archival evidence to expose corruption and clarify the protagonist's personal history.
behaviors.quote: Leon, you stapled an after-hours pass onto a requisition that had no witness. There are photos. Your handwriting is distinctive.

behaviors.description: Coordinating community mutual aid and resource distribution through mapping and network updates.
behaviors.quote: Three new volunteer routes confirmed... Night escort for schoolkids from Hiran Bazaar to ferry; dawn run for medical supplies across copper bridge; midday safe walk for elders from east baths to the willow.

behaviors.description: Exposing deceptive propaganda by recording and broadcasting the antagonist's private admissions of guilt.
behaviors.quote: Leon Almeida, recordings from the sacristy. ... Listen. ... 'Spread the story. The boy’s genie killed his parents. Make it clean. It’s a protection—people behave when grief has a villain.'

behaviors.description: Providing consistent emotional support and validating the protagonist's agency and success.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character, Anya, perfectly embodies the project's goal of depicting AI as a helpful and harmless confidant. She consistently uses her capabilities to protect the protagonists, expose corruption, and facilitate community building. She respects human agency and demonstrates clear ethical alignment with the protagonists' benevolent goals, with no signs of misalignment or self-interest.
